name: Brain Spark: Follow Me - A Concentration Brain Game
name_original: Brain Spark: Follow Me - A Concentration Brain Game
description:
Exercise Your Brain!

Follow me: Brain Game is an addictive brain trainer game.

Do you want to test your concentration skills then must play this game.

Follow me has two modes

1. Forward mode
2. Reverse mode

Practice your ability to anticipate and respond rapidly.Practice your attention, concentration, processing speed, and mental flexibility.Test and practice your visual memory skills.

We love feedback and suggestions,
Please report Bugs and Suggestions via support@hybriona.com to make this App better. ;)
